name: Light of Foliar Incision
description: This gilded blade was made using precious white branches. It was once used to destroy countless poisons that infested the forest.
refinements:
CRIT Rate is increased by **4**
%. After Normal Attacks deal Elemental DMG, the Foliar Incision effect will be obtained, increasing DMG dealt by Normal Attacks and Elemental Skills by **120**
% of Elemental Mastery. This effect will disappear after 28 DMG instances or 12s. You can obtain Foliar Incision once every 12s.
